name: SURYS
goal:
Our goal is to inform the Commission about the security solutions (services & products) offered by SURYS for
- Tax stamp systems including authentication and traceability,
- ID & travel documents securisation, personalization and authentication
- Brand Protection comprising authentication, identification, track & trace
- Smart systems for smartphone authentication and traceability solutions using smart Apps
- Vehicle registration documents and authentication solution such as windshield and car plates labels
interests: Customs, Foreign affairs and security policy, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Our identified fields of interest are mainly:
- Tobacco products directive (2014/40/EU)
- Falsified Medicine Directive (2014/62/EU)
- Visa stickers
- Driving licences
- Digital Identity
- ID documents
- Breeder documents
- Border control
- Blockchain
- Intellectual property and anti-counterfeiting
